code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import PostService from'./PostService';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PostList=()=>{const[posts,setPosts]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{loadPosts();},[]);const loadPosts=async()=>{const result=await PostService.getPosts();setPosts(result.data);};const deletePost=async id=>{await PostService.deletePost(id);loadPosts();};const renderHTML=htmlString=>{return{__html:htmlString};};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-white min-h-screen",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto px-4 pt-8 pb-16 max-w-xl",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-center text-3xl font-bold text-gray-800 mb-12",children:"Recycling Ideas"}),posts.map(post=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-white shadow-md rounded-lg overflow-hidden mb-10",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"https://avatar.iran.liara.run/public/boy?username=".concat(post.email),alt:"Profile",className:"h-12 w-12 rounded-full bg-gray-300"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ml-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-sm font-medium text-gray-900",children:post.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-sm text-gray-500",children:post.email})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ml-auto text-sm text-gray-500",children:new Date(post.date).toLocaleDateString()})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-2",children:post.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-700 mb-4",dangerouslySetInnerHTML:renderHTML(post.content)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deletePost(post.id),className:"bg-red-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-red-600",children:"Delete"})]})},post.id))]})});};export default PostList;
